summary: a miRNA profiling study has not been conducted for foot-and-mouth disease virus (FMDV) infection. the relative abundance of 169 miRNAs was measured in bovine serum. bta-miR-17-5p was highest expressed during acute infection. bta-miR-31 was the highest during FMDV persistence. (DOCX 21 kb) Additional file 3: Table S2 (15.4KB, docx) Predicted FMDV genomic targets for indicated miRNAs.
